message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a very reasonable price of $130.  I think it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a budget of $120. Would you be able to meet me at that price point?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob.  How about we split the difference and settle at $125? It's a fantastic price for this item.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $115? I believe this would be a fair compromise.
